content: skydd - a swedish word for protection quick and cute crochet bib for the wee ones size one size appr nb-12 months gauge appr 5 sts per inch materials sport weight yarn appr 70-80 yards or 65-75 meters 3 or 3 5 mm crochet hook or size to get gauge although gauge is not cricital needle for weaving in ends abbreviations us terminology st = stitch chain = chain sts = stitches double_crochet = double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet decrease = double_crochet 2 sts together 1 st decreased decrease = single_crochet 2 sts together 1 st decreased pattern row 6 turn work rejoin yarn at the do not turn work evenly work 1 round of center of the first side corner single_crochet in each single_crochet s around the whole bib for a more stitch to the other side corner pass the sturdy edging while at the same time corner in the middle of the bib 39 sts working ties as follows when reaching chain 37 sts including 1 corner in the middle remain the point at the neckline work 45 chain slip stitch in each stitch down to the bib single_crochet row 1 in 4th and 5th chain from hook work row 7 ch3 turn work in the 2nd and 3rd along the neckline and work the same tie decrease double_crochet in next 5 sts dc3 in next stitch st of row work decrease double_crochet in each stitch to on the other side finish the round of single_crochet s double_crochet in next 8 sts dc3 in next st twice double_crochet in center of corner 3 double_crochet in center corner cut yarn and fasten_off next 5 sts decrease double_crochet 39 sts stitch double_crochet in each stitch until last 3 sts work decrease in next 2 sts double_crochet in last st block if desired row 2 ch1 replaces first single_crochet throughout turn work decrease in the next 2 sts single_crochet to row 8 ch1 turn work in the 2nd and 3rd center of corner -
